comment: "I did a 150 word front-of-the book item. It was about a [redacted] company that I felt warranted a longer feature piece, but this is all the magazine wanted. [After it ran in print,] for $0, I cleaned up my interview transcript and filed a Q & A for the mag's website. Frankly, it is against my rules to do work that is unpaid, but I felt the company deserved the exposure."
